org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

Class JAContextActivator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.ActorBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.JAContextActivator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Actor, org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FactoryLocatorActivator

    public abstract class JAContextActivator
extends ActorBase
implements org.osgi.framework.BundleActivator, org.osgi.service.cm.ManagedService, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A basic activator with a JAContext, with a reference to the BundleContext stored in the bundleContext property in the JAContext.

      • jaContextStart

        protected final void jaContextStart()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Create and initialize the mailbox factory. The Properties object of the mailbox factory is created and a bundleContext is added to it. The activator is also added to the close set of the mailbox factory and the activator is given a mailbox that may block.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • isBundleClosing
